The nature and climate crises need to be tackled at the same time - we must reduce our carbon emissions in PARALLEL to taking #naturepositive action using natural regenerative processes to lock up carbon for the long-term.

#permanence #additionality #ethicaleconomy @EnvAgency

With #neirf funding, we will be scaling up large-scale #restoration of native habitats across the UK to create carbon & wildlife-rich, climate-resilient landscapes that pave the way for nature’s recovery whilst tackling the #ClimateCrisis.

@EnvAgency

Delighted that #neirf are supporting @WilderCarbon to establish dual project & buyer-facing Standards and MRV (Monitoring, Reporting & Verification) that challenge traditional #offsetting and set a benchmark for real carbon removals.

urls.title: Protect our world - Environment Agency
urls.description: Join us and build a career that matters.  Protect people, natural spaces, wildlife and our shared future. Safeguard what matters most from the devastating impact of floods. You can be part of an ambitious and innovative £5.2billion capital investment programme to reduce flood risk using both built and more natural flood defences.  Find out how […]

urls.title: The State of the Urban Environment: How make cities Clean, Green and Just
urls.description: Global Action Plan will be hosting a joint online event with the Environment Agency on environmental justice on Tuesday 20 July at 11am. The event will launch the EA’s latest report on the State of the Urban Environment and include a major speech from the EA’s Chief Executive, Sir James Bevan.
